value.title: Power BI Paginated Reports in a Day - 20: Beyond Report Development - Part 1
value.excerpt: In this video, we describe how to publish reports to the Power BI service, and also cover consuming, delivering, and embedding paginated reports. Finally, we discuss when it's a good choice to create a paginated report instead of a Power BI report.  The Power BI Paginated Reports in a Day online course

value.title: PowerBI.Tips - Tutorial - ALM ToolKit with Christian Wade

ALM Toolkit provides the following features: - Database Compare - Code Merging - Easy Deployments - Source-Control

value.title: Age Calculation in Power BI using Power Query
value.excerpt: Power Query has a simple way of calculating the age. However, because DAX is the popular language in many calculations in Power BI, many are not aware of this function in Power Query. value.title: Combining Tables in Power BI   Union Except and Intersect in DAX

value.title: Exception Reporting in Power BI Catch the Error Rows in Power Query
value.excerpt: To build a robust BI system, you need to cater for errors and handle errors carefully. If you build a reporting solution that the refresh of that fails everytime an error occurs, it is not a robust system. Errors can happen by many reasons, In this video, I’ll show you a way to catch potential errors

value.title: How to use AddColumns function in DAX and Power BI
value.excerpt: AddColumns is a DAX function that is helpful often when writing calculations in Power BI. value.title: Microsoft Power BI: Unleash row level security patterns in Power BI - THR3015
value.excerpt: Security is different from sharing; sharing is about sharing the entire content with others—security is about authorizing different views of the content to others. value.title: Performance Tip for Power BI Enable Load Sucks Memory Up
value.excerpt: In the area of performance tuning a Power BI model, many things have to be considered, most of them around the consumption of the CPU and RAM.
